alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued March 25 at 1:24AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Texas Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK. THE EVERMAN POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR NOEL RODRIGUEZ-ALVEREZ, HISPANIC, MALE, 6 YEARS OLD, UNKNOWN HEIGHT, UNKNOWN WEIGHT, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR CINDY CECILIA RODRIGUEZ-SINGH, 37 YEARS OLD, HISPANIC, FEMALE, 5 FEET TALL, 140 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES AND HAS TATTOOS ACROSS HER CHEST, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A GRAY, 2012, CHEVROLET, SILVERADO BEARING TEXAS LICENSE PLATE NUMBER P L S 7 0 9 1. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN EVERMAN, TEXAS. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE EVERMAN POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 8 1 7 2 9 3 2 9 2 3.
